phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Unit 01's interlocking circuit has been cut.
What about the force eject signal?
It is being blocked from the plug side.
But, Shinji, if we had not done that you would have been killed.
Unit 01 has 185 seconds of power left in its reserves.
That is enough to destroy at least half of Headquarters.
The way he is right now, he will do it too.
If Commander Ikari had not made that decision,
I said that is not the point!
My father tried to kill Toji using my hands!
Father, you are there, are not you?
Increase the pressure of the LCL to maximum.
We have no time to waste on a petulant child.
I have still got a direct control circuit...
The right breast has been completely dissolved.
We will begin cleansing the bodily fluids from Unit 03 on schedule.
I could not just lie in bed during an emergency like this.
I understand that they opened the escape hatch with a laser cutter,
That idiot will not find a way out this time.
He was not injured, so he ought to be okay.
Do not tell me you do not dream?
Do not tell me you do not dream?
Why is he lying here next to me?
In the same hospital where my sister is, maybe?
Hey, is not that Shinji and Ayanami?
Ikari, why did you do that?
Because I could not forgive my father.
Even though I was finally able to talk to him,
he does not understand me at all!!
Did you try to understand your father's feelings?
Why do not you try to understand him?
You are running away from unpleasant truths.
What is wrong with running away from reality if it sucks?!
What are those two arguing about?
If it is not the Class Rep...
I thought Shinji was here though.
You have slept for three days, Suzuhara.
No, I came here as the class representative!
I am sorry that I did not get to eat the lunch you made.
But I am sorry that I cannot bring you a lunch here, it is not allowed.
Would you do me a favor?
Would you do me a favor?
Would you tell my sister that there is nothing wrong with me?
The Commander wants to see you.
Disobeying orders, personal occupation of an Eva,
Do you have anything to say?
Yes, I do not want to pilot an Eva anymore.
I do not want to stay here anymore.
Yes, I will go back to my teacher's place.
So you are running away again?
I assume that we will never meet again.
Rei will be Unit 01's designated pilot,
with the dummy plug as back up.
Is it true that you are leaving?
It is true, is not it?
Why are you running away again?
Even Toji became an Eva pilot, while I...
For security reasons we have terminated this call.
I assume that Asuka is disgusted with me.
Yes, she did not even ask me to say goodbye to you.
It is going to be hard if you keep hiding your anger like that.
As I am sure you know,
there will be a lot of restrictions placed on your activities.
Let me ask you one thing.
Why was Toji chosen to be the Fourth Child?
All your classmates are Fourth Level candidates.
I just found out myself that it was yet another set-up.
Suzuhara was a mistake that cannot be mended with words alone.
I was projecting all of my dreams, hopes and purpose onto you.
I know that it is been a huge burden for you.
had no choice except to entrust our future to you.
I want you to remember that.
It is a selfish because, is not it?
I will leave your pass code to HQ and your room as they are.
I will not pilot an Eva again.
That is the real Shinji talking.
I have never heard him so positive before.
A special state of emergency is declared for the Tokai region.
All citizens must evacuate to their designated shelters immediately.
All personnel go to first stage battle stations.
It is moving into our perimeter.
It is moving into our perimeter.
The Komagatake Defense Line has been breached.
The first eighteen layers of armor have been shattered.
Eighteen layers of special armor at once!
The Eva will not make there in time for a ground level intercept.
Position Unit 02 for combat inside the Geo-Front,
Asuka will engage the target as soon as it breaches the Geo-Front.
It is been placed in the AT Field Neutralization Zone.
However, the left arm has not been regenerated yet.
Then, it is not ready for combat.
Prepare a dummy plug as the backup system.
It is not going to work this time.
Unit 01 is refusing the neural connection!
Re-activate Unit 01 with the dummy plug.
If I die, I can be replaced.
If I die, I can be replaced.
I swore I would never pilot it again.
One more hit, and the armor will be completely destroyed.
I am counting on you, Asuka.
Even without Shinji, I can beat it easily.
I am neutralizing its AT Field, are not I?
Asuka, cut all the nerve connections now!
That stuff's not for us pilots.
Direct hit on the Eighth Block!
All survivors, go to the Third Shelter!
It is refusing the dummy plug.
I am leaving you in charge of this.
Take casualties to the Sixth Block.
Uninjured, go to the Third Shelter!
What are you doing here, Shinji?
I decided that I will never pilot an Eva again.
Well, since my other job became public knowledge,
I am off the combat roster.
Although I would rather be between Misato's breasts,
I would not mind being here when I die.
It is said if an Angel makes contact with Adam, who lies below here,
The only thing that can stop it
is the one thing with power equal to an Angel's, the Evangelion.
Is she trying to blow herself up?
Shinji, the only thing I can do is stand here and water.
But you, you have something that you can do.
Think for yourself, and make the decision by yourself.
Think about what you have to do now.
Think about no longer having any regrets.
Direct hit on the third foundation.
The final armor plate has melted.
The Main Shaft is completely open!
It is refusing the dummy plug.
I am the pilot of Evangelion Unit 01!
The target has entered the Main Shaft.
It is advancing directly towards Central Dogma.
The backup power supply is not working.
Move now or there is no point to this!
I am sick of it already!
Does that means she is been awakened?
She is taking the S2 engine into herself?
Those are restraints that allow us to control the Eva's power.
But now the Eva is removing the web that binds it to our will.
We can no longer control the Eva.
Unit 01's been awakened and set free.
SEELE will not stay quiet for this.
Did you say this was part of your scenario, Commander Ikari?
It is begun, has not it?
Mankind has been saved by the Eva's awakening,
but its pilot has been physically fused with the Eva.
Shinji's been fused with another existence.
What was it that the crying Misato saw?
Next time: Shape of Heart, Shape of Human
